text:
A new tabloid report alleges Queen Elizabeth is upset about Meghan Markle ’s ex-husband, Trevor Engelson , making a royal-inspired sitcom, but the entire story is nothing more than a fabrication. Gossip Cop can debunk this bogus claim. The baseless allegation can be found in the pages of this week’s Life & Style, which blares in a […]

title: Queen Elizabeth Upset Meghan Markle’s Ex-Husband Is Making Royal-Inspired Sitcom?
